about_the_game:
The lucky land is already in chaos. In order to restore order to this land, brave adventurers should embark on a journey.

Game gameplay

+ LuckLand is a strategy casual game that combines elements such as card building and Roguelike.
+ You need to accumulate energy in the battle and defeat the enemy to achieve victory.
+ The game operation is simple, just click the rotation button, and the system will automatically calculate energy based on the combination of chess pieces, and engage in a life and death battle with the enemy after several rounds.
+ Each round, different pieces can be selected to join the chessboard, forming various combinations to gain high energy and defeat enemies with increasing difficulty.

Collect pieces and construct combinations

+ Collect pieces and treasures from different regions and confront enemies on a 4x5 chessboard.
+ Completing orders at the Color Workshop, searching for treasure chests in the Treasure Bay, or all in at the Destiny Casino is all up to you.

Unlock treasures & talents to elevate

+ As the game progresses, the difficulty will gradually increase.
+ Defeat higher difficulty enemies, unlock exclusive treasures, and give your deck a qualitative leap.
+ Defeat higher difficulty enemies, unlock powerful talents, and they will make you more adept in the exploration process.

Good luck!

name: LuckLand Demo
short_description: LuckLand is a strategy casual game that combines elements such as card building and Roguelike. To achieve ultimate victory, all you need to do is rotate the chessboard. This game does not include any real world currency gambling or micro trading.
